item.description:
Min/Max: Min of 4, Max of 20 members

Event Fees: $2 event fee
Annual Members - FREE
Guests: $2 event fee

Ten Pin = $5.20 each string pp
Candlepin = $4.55 each string pp
Shoes = $4.45 includes free pair of sox

Details:

Hi All -

Since we had so much fun at Timber Lanes bowling a couple weeks ago, I thought we'd try it again at Boston Bowl located just outside Quincy for a night of Cosmic Bowling. For those of you who don't know what cosmic bowling is - the bowling alley dims the house lights, lights the lanes, has disco balls, music, fake smoke - things like that - it's FUN!!!

We're planning to meet 7:30 pm, Friday, November 13th at Boston Bowl, just outside Quincy near Neponsett Circle on Morrissey Boulevard. Please plan to meet a couple minutes before to get shoes and schedule teams etc.

There is a minimum of 4 Participants (Non-organizers) by noon on Thursday, November 12th.

Organizers: Susan (AO)

Please Note:

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Carpool: There is no carpool for this event. Members should meet at Boston Bowl. If you would like to carpool you may note where from in your RSVP comments and someone else may choose to contact you if they are also interested in carpooling.

RSVP Deadline: Thursday, November 12th @ 12:00 PM. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Bowl - Cosmic Bowling
